name: Ooze-Folk
conditionImmune: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, prone

trait.name: Transparent
text: Even when an ooze-folk is in plain sight, it takes a DC 12 Wisdom (Perception) check to spot an ooze-folk that has neither moved nor attacked. A creature that tries to enter the ooze-folk's space while unaware of the ooze-folk is surprised by the ooze-folk.

trait.name: Fragile Bones
text: For each 5 damage it takes, the ooze-folk's walking speed is reduced by 5 feet.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The ooze folk makes one glass longsword attack and one pseudopod attack.

action.name: Glass Longsword
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 6 (1d8 + 2) slashing damage. If a 1 is rolled on an attack roll with a glass longsword, it shatters and can no longer be used.

action.name: Pseudopod
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 5 (1d6 + 2) acid damage.

description: Source: Lost Laboratory of Kwalish p. 46
